whyChooseUs.title: Quality, innovation and food safety.
whyChooseUs.text1: NAYA Success Axis is an Agribusiness that started as a backyard poultry farm in 2018. It was registered as a fulltime business in April 2019 at the Registrar General Department. It Currently has 2 branches in Accra – Adenta and Aburi - Mariakrom in the Eastern Region.

products.text: Healthy, well-raised live poultry layers sourced from trusted farms.
Farm-fresh eggs collected daily, ensuring natural taste and quality.
Clean, high-quality broiler wings, breast, thighs, neck, full broiler etc.
Healthy smoked chicken in various prices and sizes, very clean and hygienic.

whyChooseUs.title2: We take care of your health
whyChooseUs.text2: Our poultry and eggs are sourced from healthy, well-maintained farms to ensure that every product you consume is safe, nutritious, and of the highest quality. Your health is our priority.

products.name: The Best Poultry
products.text: Fresh and healthy poultry raised on trusted farms, ensuring top quality for your meals.

products.name: Chick Quality
products.text: Healthy, strong chicks ideal for farmers and hatcheries, sourced from reliable breeders.

products.name: Pasteurized Egg
products.text: Safe and hygienically pasteurized eggs, retaining all nutrients and natural flavor.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The quality of chicks we received was exceptional. 98% survival rate and they're thriving. Best poultry supplier we've worked with in 15 years of farming.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Their commitment to animal welfare and organic practices aligns perfectly with our values. The eggs are consistently fresh and customers love them.

testimonials.name: Felix Oteng
testimonials.content: I really like your website interface it is really nice, catchy and easily navigated. Your products are all quality, I really loved the chicken meat.

ourteamSection.title: Meet Our Team
ourteamSection.text: Our team works really hard to keep this wonderful company going to produce and meet consumers' needs.

members.name: Miguel Kean
members.description: Oversees harvesting operations ensuring quality and efficiency across all farms.

members.name: Amara Chen
members.description: Implements eco-friendly practices and manages our green certification programs.
